FuncDef: The display license resource usage port-basic command displays information about interface-specific basic hardware licenses.
CLIs: display license resource usage port-basic { all | slot <slotid> } [ active | deactive ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays all the authorization information about the interface-specific basic hardware licenses.
-

Specifies the slot ID of a controlled board.
-

Displays authorization information about interface-specific basic hardware licenses for which the active port-basic command is run.
-

Displays authorization information about interface-specific basic hardware licenses for which the active port-basic command is not run.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display license resource usage port-basic all
FeatureName            Offline     Allocated     Activated     Available     Total
Physical Position    FeatureName     Needed Count    Used Count      Active Status
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To view information about interface-specific basic hardware licenses, run the display license resource usage port-basic command. The command output is used in routine maintenance.
This command applies only to boards in CM mode.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
